Definition.WordDefinition: MONDAY, n. In Christian countries, the day after the baseball game.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Monday \Mon"day\ (m[u^]n"d[asl]; 48), n. [OE. moneday, monenday, AS. m[=o]nand[ae]g, i.e., day of the moon, day sacred to the moon; akin to D. maandag, G. montag, OHG. m[=a]natag, Icel. m[=a]nadagr, Dan. mandag, Sw. m[*a]ndag. See {Moon}, and {Day}.] The second day of the week; the day following Sunday. [1913 Webster]
Monday n : the second day of the week; the first working day [syn: {Mon}]
